A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is the worst and most stupid Star Wars movie it has a stupid subplot where 3 of the characters with a dumb plan get 95% of the fleeing Resistance killed\,  Snoke has a massive magnifying glass so he can see the Resistance ships escape from the Raddus capital ship which should be called the radish as it's got all the firepower of a root vegetable. Mark Hamill is superb and there was little of loved characters like Chewbacca and R2D2. The Last Jedi makes The Phantom Menace look like The Empire Strikes Back I am a Very Disappointed EX STAR WARS FAN.
